div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1620 Damascus ?, Coelesyria, 1940 Burial: c. 100-50 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 68 AE Antiochus VII: Jerusalem 1 (as Rois de Syrie 1166) Antiochus incertus: 1 Tyre: 25 (as BMC 251) Sidon: 1 (as BMC 91) Judas Aristobulus: a (as BMC 1 ff.) Alexander Jannaeus: 1 (as BMC 30 f.) Unc. Hasmonaeans: 9 Unc.: 28 Disposition: dispersed Information from H. Seyrig
